/>
Introduction
This topic contains general information on Veteran status based on Merchant Marine service, including
eligibility for a U.S. Merchant Marine discharge certificate
merchant mariners who are eligible for all VA benefits under
Public Law (PL) 95-202
merchant mariners who are eligible for burial benefits only under
PL 105-368
applying for a
DD Form 214
,
Certificate of Discharge or Release from Active Duty
, or a
DD Form 1300
,
Report of Casualty
, for Merchant Marine service
, and
determining where to send
DD Form 2168,
Application for Discharge of Member or Survivor of Member of Group Certified To Have Performed Active Duty with the Armed Forces of the United States
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status Based on Merchant Marine Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A
